segments.text: Good morning , Miss Monica . Nice to meet you again !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good morning , Mr . Thomas , it is nice to see you too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: After the internal discussion , we have all agreed that you are the most suitable person for this position among all the candidates . So , today let ’ s talk about your expected salary and social benefits . What is your expected salary ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve worked in the field for more than 4 years . Depend on my work qualifications and experience , I would like to have 5000 Yuan to start .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The basic salary for your position in our company would be 4800 Yuan to start with increases giving according to your performance .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is a bit lower than I expected . But I can accept that . What are the working hours ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: 40 hours a week , Monday to Friday , 9 AM to 5 PM with one hour lunch break every day ..
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do I have to work on weekend ? If so , how do you pay for the overtime ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We do expect overtime work when it is necessary , but we pay twice of the work hour for working on weekends and three times for working on national holidays like Spring Festival and the Mid-Autumn Day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No probation is involved . If you feel good , you can start next week .
segments.speaker: S1
